name: ly-sidemenu
description: A layout sidemenu component with year buttons supporting different states (default, hovered, active)

methods.name: generateText
methods.description: Generate the sidemenu HTML with dynamic year data

arguments.name: years
arguments.description: Array of year objects with properties: year (string), unit (string), state (string: 'default' | 'active')

arguments.name: currentYear
arguments.description: The currently active year to highlight
